it.polimi.se2018.networking.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.networking.server.Server
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HybridServer, RmiServer, TcpServer

    public abstract class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for servers.

    Subclasses only have to deal with connections and all those mechanisms that are required for the correct operations the network protocol they implement.

    This class is immutable and thread-safe.

    Author:
    dvdmff

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server()
        Creates a master server.

        A master server is a server that has no super server and directly handles connections.

      • Server

        public Server(Server masterServer)
        Creates a slave server.

        A slave server is a server that has a master server and thus doesn't directly handle connections by itself, but delegates its master to do so.

        Parameters:
        masterServer - The reference to the master server.

    • Method Detail

      • getServerNetInterface

        public final ServerNetInterface getServerNetInterface()
        Getter for the net interface of the server.
        Returns:
        The net interface of the server.

      • getClients

        public final java.util.List<ClientNetInterface> getClients()
        Getter for connected clients.
        Returns:
        A list of all the connected clients the server is responsible for.

      • getClientFor

        public final ClientNetInterface getClientFor(java.lang.String name)
        Returns only the connection associated with the specified username.
        Parameters:
        name - The name that is associated with the desired connection.
        Returns:
        The connection associated with name.

      • addClient

        public final boolean addClient(ClientNetInterface client)
        Adds a new connection.

        If the username is already taken, nothing is done and false is returned.

        Parameters:
        client - The client to be added.
        Returns:
        true if the client has been successfully added; false otherwise.

      • removeClient

        public final void removeClient(ClientNetInterface client)
        Removes a client connection if it exists.
        Parameters:
        client - The client connection to be removed.

      • start

        public abstract void start()
        Starts the server.

      • stop

        public abstract void stop()
        Stops the server.

      • isRunning

        public abstract boolean isRunning()
        Tells if the server is currently running.
        Returns:
        true if the server is running; false otherwise.

      • getMasterServer

        public final Server getMasterServer()
        Getter for the super system of the server.
        Returns:
        The reference to the super system, or null if it doesn't exist.
